articles.title: South Asians in UK at greater risk from Covid - BBC News
articles.description: People from an Indian, Pakistani or Bangladeshi background suffered more, the Lancet study shows.
articles.content:
People from a South Asian background were at even greater risk of infection, hospitalisation and death in the second wave of Covid than the first, compared with other ethnic groups, a study says.
